name: Micro
body:
### What is Micro? Micro is a microservices toolkit. It's goal is to simplify distributed systems development. ### What are microservices? Microservices is an architecture pattern used to decompose an application into many small services which communicate over a network. ### Features Feature | Description ------ | ------- [Go-Micro](https://godoc.org/github.com/micro/go-micro) | A Go RPC framework [API](https://github.com/micro/micro/tree/master/api) | API Gateway [CLI](https://github.com/micro/micro/tree/master/cli) | Command line interface [Sidecar](https://github.com/micro/micro/tree/master/car) | Language agnostic RPC proxy [Web](https://github.com/micro/micro/tree/master/web) | Web UI and reverse proxy

### Learn More Visit the [repo](https://github.com/micro/micro) to get started
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
